attributes.action: Introduce random alcohol and drug testing for MPs.
attributes.additional_details: Too many MPs are involved in a drink / drug culture. Unacceptable.
attributes.background: Introduce compulsory alcohol and drug testing for sitting MPs. Those who fail should be deselected.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619602
